text: Teacher Adeline has been a fantastic piano teacher for our son, Nathaniel! As his third teacher, she has made a remarkable difference in his learning journey. Her firm yet approachable and patient teaching style has truly inspired him. For the first time, weâ€™ve seen Nathaniel so passionate and motivated about piano. He willingly practices on his own and even requests additional homework from herâ€”a testament to her ability to engage and encourage her students. We are incredibly impressed and grateful for her dedication and skill in nurturing Nathanielâ€™s musical growth! Highly recommended!

Adeline was a good teacher and my son really enjoyed the way she taught piano. Adeline was always so encouraging, as well as giving great ideas and techniques of ways to improve. Thanks Adeline for being so good with the students.

Adeline is a wonderful, cheerful teacher!
She is a very patient teacher; and I, an adult learner, receives lots of encouragement. Greatly appreciated.
Her lessons were never short of joy and laughter!

I cannot recommend Ms. Adeline  enough as a piano teacher for young children. My 4.5 years daughter has been taking lessons with her for the past 1.5 years since she was 3.  Ms. Adeline has a wonderful way of engaging with young children, making the lessons fun and interactive.

She has a nurturing yet firm  approach, which has helped my daughter feel comfortable and confident while learning. My daughter looks forward to her weekly lessons and has developed a true love for playing the piano.

I'm 75 and I started piano lessons with Ms Adeline Yeo a few months back. My music reading then, was rather weak. But with her patience & encouragement, I improved tremendously! She has helped me gain much confidence.
Now I enjoy playing the piano. Thank you Adeline!
